meanings.definition: To move or transfer (a plant) from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: I am transplanting the flowers from the garden to the pots.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys transplanting vegetables to different parts of the farm.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried transplanting the tulips into the bird feeder!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like transplanting hope into a barren heart.
meanings.sent5: The act of transplanting requires careful handling to ensure the plant's survival.

meanings.definition: The act of moving or transferring a plant from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: Transplanting can help plants thrive in new environments.
meanings.sent2: The transplanting of the trees was done early in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The transplanting of the cactus into a teacup was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of life, transplanting represents growth and change.
meanings.sent5: The transplanting of the roses brought color and life to the dull yard.
